name: ShakeShake! for SayHi
description: NOTICE: You need to install SayHi! first to launch this plugin  A free and convenient chat plugin for SayHi! You can find a person nearby conveniently by just shaking your phone.So no longer wait, shake your device and shine your life!  Function introduction:  1.You can find out a user conveniently by choosing the gender you are interested in and shaking your mobile.  2.Perfectly be supported by SayHi!  3.Totally free
